The computer scientist was Google's founding CEO before handing the reins to Mr. Eric Schmidt in August 2001." -- Eric Schmidt 's "An update from the Chairman," on The Official Google Blog: Sergey Brin has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will be Co-Founder.... I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach. target="_blank" SchmidtEric Schmidt: "Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!...
